name: Ngwaka Lightning Spirits
shortLoreBlurb: Ngwaka Lightning Spirits is a spirits from DRC (Ngwaka) associated with lightning, justice. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings.
overlapsLinks: Athena (Greek), Indra (Vedic), Karttikeya (Hindu), Morrigan (Celtic), Perun (Slavic), Sekhmet (Egyptian), Thor (Norse), Zeus (Greek)
description: Ngwaka Lightning Spirits is a spirits from DRC (Ngwaka) associated with lightning, justice. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings.
